channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- .NET Framework and .NET Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- .NET Framework and .NET Core

item.title: CVE-2018-0764|2024-08-05T03:35:49.330Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- .net%20framework%20and%20.net%20core
item.description: Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1, 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 3.5.1, 4, 4.5, 4.5.1, 4.5.2, 4.6, 4.6.1, 4.6.2 and 5.7 and .NET Core 1.0. 1.1 and 2.0 allow a denial of service vulnerability due to the way XML documents are processed, aka ".NET and .NET Core Denial Of Service Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0765.
